sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_report_field_alias</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sys_report_field_alias">reportISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="report" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Validate Creation of Field Alias</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { var reportGR = new GlideRecord('sys_report'); if (! reportGR.isValid()) { gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('There is something wrong with the report table')); current.setAbortAction(true); } reportGR.setWorkflow(false); if (! reportGR.get(current.report)) { gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('This report does not exist')); current.setAbortAction(true); } if (! reportGR.canWrite()) { gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('You do not have permission to access the report')); current.setAbortAction(true); } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-04-14 15:18:24</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>1f5912ebc780101032d1514098c260cc</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Validate Creation of Field Alias</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Reporting" source="com.glideapp.report">4433b8603c31311068bcf327dfe37f37</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_1f5912ebc780101032d1514098c260cc</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-10-10 23:01:56</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1f5912ebc780101032d1514098c260cc"/> </record_update>
